name: Plyometric Workouts
description: Building explosive power and agility through jump-based exercises.

cards.title: Box Jumps for Explosive Leg Power
cards.description: Enhancing lower-body explosiveness with controlled box jumps.
bulletpoints: Use a sturdy box or platform at an appropriate height
Engage core and arms to propel upward
Land softly with knees slightly bent to absorb impact
cards.summaryText: Load and explode onto the box, swinging arms and landing softly to build springy leg power.

cards.title: Depth Jumps for Maximum Power Output
cards.description: Developing reactive power and explosive takeoff ability.
bulletpoints: Step off a platform and immediately explode into a vertical jump
Minimize ground contact time for better power transfer
Engage calves, quads, and glutes for maximum lift
cards.summaryText: Drop, absorb, then rebound instantly skyward to sharpen reactive, explosive takeoff strength.
